snippet: Mr. Wilson was a social scientist whose research laid the groundwork for crime reduction efforts in several cities.
abstract: James Q Wilson, wide-ranging social scientist whose theories of law enforcement laid the groundwork for crime reduction programs in New York, Los Angeles and other cities, dies at age 80; Wilson was the author of disquisitions on politics, the family, the nature of bureaucracies, virtue and vice that both countered and steered intellectual trends.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Wilson was a social scientist whose research laid the groundwork for crime reduction efforts in several cities.

headline.seo: James Q. Wilson Dies at 80; Originated ‘Broken Windows’ Policing Strategy
headline.main: James Q. Wilson Dies at 80; Originated ‘Broken Windows’ Policing Strategy
headline.print_headline: Scholar Turned Crime Fighter (With a Theory)
